About the Company: Pratibha Industries Ltd operates in the following two business areas namely Infrastructure and Helical Saw Pipes & Coatings.The company is dedicated and committed to providing the society at large with quality infrastructure in their field of expertise which currently include design, engineering and execution/construction of complex & integrated water transmission & distribution projects, water treatment plants, elevated and underground reservoirs, mass housing projects, commercial complexes, pre-cast design & construction, road construction and real estate..The company also in the business segment of Infrastructure & Construction.
